phrases: hontou wa totemo totemo ureshikatta yo
but the truth is, I was really, really happy.
You have finally come home but all you do is dilly-dally around the house and skip school.
I will clean up on my own, so just go away.
Poppo wants to meet up to make the final arrangements tonight.
Anyway, let us meet up in front of the subway station...
By the way, is Tsurumi still the same as always?
She acts like she is the only one who understands you.
He is 181 cm tall and weighs 68 kilos.
His favorite food is a bean paste pastry.
Wait Tsurumi, we still have not asked what we wanted to.
You agreed not to talk about that.
Alright, let us get to it!
Let us start our grand preparations for Menma's ascent to heaven tomorrow!
Let us make some decorations, partner!
I am going to make flowers out of tissues!
You are the guest of honor.
Why are you getting involved in the preparations?
Make a garbage can out of those papers.
Back in the day I was a little dork.
I acted like an idiot so people would pay attention to me.
But Jintan and everyone else became my friends, and in the end...
Even though all I could do was watch everyone else from the sidelines...
All I could do was watch...
Anyway, that is why I am taking care of everything this time.
I will send you off in style, Menma.
I am looking forward to it.
What do you plan to do about that?
There is no way I could go.
How much will those kids torment me before they are satisfied?
Why would you do that, Saa?
Do you even know how tall I am?
I have grown a lot this past year.
It must have been lonesome, for both you and Satoshi.
There is no way you can forget about Meiko, and that is fine.
But I think we are all lonely.
You, Satoshi, and myself, the three of us are together.
You mean if they launch the fireworks?
I used to think about it all the time.
If Menma disappeared, Jintan and I would be able to get along well.
When Menma really disappeared, Jintan and I only became more distant.
We have grown closer again, but that is only because Menma came back.
That is something to be grateful for.
Are you going to the secret base today?
You pushed so hard for making her go to heaven, but now that it really comes down to it you are afraid.
You are afraid, so you run away from Menma and stay with Anjou.
You want to know you are not the only one who is miserable, do not you?
I remembered about that time when Menma called us.
She wanted to ask us to do something for Jintan.
I have a request for you.
It is something only you can do, Anaru.
It is fine, I will see them tomorrow anyway.
I expected no less from you.
I knew you would show up!
So they have all shown up.
I feel like the end is drawing closer.
We, the founders of the Super Peace Busters, together with Menma...
Well then, please come forward Menma, our guest of honor.
Hey Menma, want some of this?
I hate spicy stuff because it hurts.
Ew ew ew, my mouth is burning!
Do not you have games or something prepared?
All we are doing is eating and drinking.
This is supposed to be our final rally.
We have all come together, so let us do something.
What kind of game did you have in mind?
How about we go through that day again?
Let us recreate how we met here on that day.
What do you want to accomplish by...
You like Menma, do not you?
If you run away now it will all be the same!
Menma did not make a sound.
She just let out a torrent of tears.
I am a disgrace either way.
That is an idea Yukiatsu instilled in you, is not it?
I mean, I already know what he would have answered that day.
You will stay lost without resolving anything even after Menma goes to heaven.
You will keep losing to a Menma that should not even be there.
How it feels like to never have the person you like take notice of you...
Yukiatsu has always been chasing after Menma.
That is the only side of him...
Once Menma goes to heaven, Yadomi will...
But Yukiatsu definitely will not choose me.
Because even if Menma goes to heaven, you are the replacement for him.
That is not the way it is!
Yukiatsu does not think of me that way.
And besides, no matter how rough it is for me I would never date Yukiatsu.
That is right, there is no replacement.
That is why we have to make Menma go to heaven.
I really put you on the spot there.
It is just that everything seemed to wind back in time again.
Is what you said earlier true?
When I said I liked you, it is not just the kind of liking between friends.
It is the kind of liking that means you want to marry me right?
If I had kept growing up normally like this, I wonder if I would have become your bride.
Even if it was not normally...
Cannot you just stay here instead of going to heaven?
I have gone and said it.
If I do not go to heaven I cannot do it.
And I will not be able to talk with everyone properly.
But if I come back as a caterpillar...
So Menma, when Jintan said he liked you, how did you answer him?
She wanted to ask us to do something for Jintan.
Let us go to heaven, okay Menma?
Am I not enough for you?
Say Menma, do you know about reincarnation?
Even if your life ends, you can come back as a baby again.
And it may not be as a human.
It could be as a baby kitten, or a baby flower.
That is why it is not scary.
But there is just one thing...
Wait just a little longer, auntie.
Everyone is going to send up fireworks.
Well then, let us start by outfitting the launch cylinder.
You look like you did when you were little.
I had a change of mood.
It is just that I caught a familiar scent.
You called Saa for me, Jintan?
So this is really the end.
It is fine like this right?
Our interests are the same as Menma's.
I will make sure she goes to heaven.
But right now I can still stop her.
I will not let him stop her.
Right now I can stop her.
Now all that is left is the launch.
This was a job well done.
Hey, does anyone have any last words or something...
Then I will just let it out.
Let us get this thing going.
If it gets too late, it will bother the neighborhood.
A flower blossomed in the sky!
I am glad you did not disappear.
Thank you for doing this for me today.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I want to be friends with everyone until the very end.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
Upon pages and pages of entries
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
Putting a bookmark in my diary
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
My other hand helps me search for you
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
You used to come find me way back when
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You used to demand me of so much more
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
You are both still standing right by my side
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
There must be something off with me
Thank you for doing this for me today.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I am going to heaven tomorrow.
I want to be friends with everyone
aa hanabi ga yozora kirei ni saite chotto setsunaku
The fireworks blossomed heartrendingly beautiful across the night sky,
aa kaze ga jikan to tomo ni nagareru
and time passed as swiftly as the wind.
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
We shared so many happy times and trilling adventures
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
namida wo koraete egao de sayounara setsunai yo ne
And I know it must have been painful to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
